name: Domains and Rulers (An Aether RPG Expansion)
name_original: Domains and Rulers (An Aether RPG Expansion)
description:
Domains and Rulers is the first (and likely largest) rules expansion for the Aether TTRPG system that gives you and your players methods and incentives for ruling over a domain and developing a community you care about in-game.

What's Included: 

  • 32 Page PDF with full layout, fully searchable and a linked Table of Contents. 
  • Form fillable Domain and Unit trackers. 

What You Get: 

  • A full system for creating and tracking domains
  • A Reputation system that provides both perks and disadvantages to players based on NPCs they recruit and how they treat people (based on the social encounter system in the Aether core rules). 
  • Random tables for generating NPC types
  • A Random Events system
  • Factions and a Nemesis System
  • Two sets of mass warfare rules: running armies against each other, and running individual units against each other.
  • Unit customization rules.

I hope you enjoy using these rules as much as I enjoyed making them!
